faqSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Hiring Real Estate Agents in Sector 34 Rohtak

faqs.question: What is the standard commission charged by real estate agents in Sector 34 Rohtak
faqs.answer: The standard commission varies slightly but generally falls between 1 to 2 percent of the total sale consideration for both buyer and seller depending on the property type complexity and value. For plots and land transactions it is typically 1 percent from each party. We maintain a transparent fee structure ensuring all charges are clearly outlined in the service agreement before we begin work so you understand the total cost involved.

faqs.question: How do you verify the legal ownership and title of plots in Sector 34
faqs.answer: Our real estate agents conduct extensive due diligence involving checking the Revenue Records Registry records and HUDA allotment papers if applicable. We verify the chain of title ensuring continuity of ownership and check for any existing mortgages liens or disputes recorded in the sub-registrar office. We ensure the property is 100 percent legally clear before advising any purchase.
